      • getTombolaLog

        @GetMapping(value={"/tombolaLog","/tombolaLog/page/{page}","/tombolaLog/page/{page}/sort/{sort}","/tombolaLog/page/{page}/sort/{sort}/filter/{filter}"},
            produces="text/html")
@PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_managerRole\', \'ROLE_adminRole\')")
public String getTombolaLog​(@PathVariable(value="page",required=false)
                            Integer pg,
                            @PathVariable(value="sort",required=false)
                            String srt,
                            @PathVariable(required=false)
                            String filter,
                            javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                            org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        HTML Log

        The method getTombolaLog for /tombolaLog

        Accessible to the RoleType.MANAGER_ROLE and RoleType.ADMIN_ROLE

        Parameters:
        pg - Integer Number from 0. Zero is the first page
        srt - String Sort by [idD, idU, mD, mU, a0D, a0U, a1D, a1U, a2D, a2U, a3D, a3U, cU, cD, lU, lD]
        filter - String Empty or filter by [DEBUG, ERROR, INFO, WARN] or their combinations. Example: 'ERROR+WARN'
        request - HttpServletRequest
        model - Model
        Returns:
        "indexLog" for thymeleaf indexLog.html String

      • signin

        @PostMapping(path="/login/signin",
             consumes="application/x-www-form-urlencoded")
public String signin​(@RequestParam @NotNull
                     @NotNull String username,
                     @RequestParam @NotNull
                     @NotNull String password,
                     javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Sign in from log in form

        The method signin for /login/signin

        For getLogin(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse, org.springframework.ui.Model) after submit <Log in> or press <↵Enter>

        Parameters:
        username - String Username
        password - String Password
        request - HttpServletRequest
        Returns:
        redirect url String
